body: 2005 24th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest        Adults' Group 1st Place Winner: Entry #18: Live Strong, by the LeCoopson Family        The 24th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest at Drakes Beach was a great success with about 65 sculptures entered. The event was well attended by over one thousand participants and observers. The weather was overcast and mild, but a good day was had by all. Below are photo galleries of the sand sculptures entered in the 24th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest.                   2005 Adults' Categories Winners   9 Photos  2005 Sand Sculpture Contest Adults' Categories Winners' photos          2005 Children's Categories Winners   9 Photos  2005 Sand Sculpture Contest Children's Individual and Children's Group Categories photos          2005 Adults' Group Category   34 Photos  2005 Sand Sculpture Contest Adults' Group Category photos            2005 Children's Categories   9 Photos  2005 Sand Sculpture Contest Children's Individual and Children's Group Categories photos                        2005 Sand Sculpture Award Results  Key: HM = Honorable Mention PC = People's Choice Awards RP = Best Use Of Recycled Plastic   Adults' Group Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   1st Live Strong The LeCoopson family   2nd Octavius The Pinkava and Leaf Families   3rd Hogwart's Quidditch Megan Davis   HM Sofa's Choice The Strutner and Whaley Families   HM Give It Up for New Orleans Kathleen Huntington   HM California Coast Chet and Phoebe Memorial Bridge Club Band   HM Reclining Buddha The Howe and Mogel Families   RP Tunnel of Condor Lisa Herbert   PC The Write Stuff The "Just Us" Family     Children's Individual Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   1st Tree Hugger Samantha   2nd My Kingdom Far Away Rachel   3rd Dog and Bone Gabriel     Children's Group Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   1st Egyptian Block Statue Circa 2005 Molly   2nd Drakes Skate Hailey, Hannah, Carly, Lindsay, and Jason   3rd Framed Beauty Mariah, Monica and Clare   HM Roller Coaster Tycoon Taylor   HM Dreams Come True Sarah   HM Gunner Dachshund Haley and Sam    Sand Sculpture Contests Photo Galleries Top of Page
